nodes.text: Nal Kapok was a world located in the galaxy. During the Clone Wars, a battle between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Galactic Republic was fought on Nal Kapok. Some time after, R0-GR visted the world and recorded his time here in this autobiography From Trenches to Wrenches: The Roger Story.
Nal Kapok first appeared in LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures but was later canonized by Star Wars: Droidography.
